I'm writing to you in order to complain about this show. The problems started when we arrived at the Theatre: my 6 year old6-year-old son had to pay the full price. Then, even if we could enter in the roomtheatre, the show didn't start before 20:15, which is 45 minutes later than expectsexpected. Indeed, we are still waiting onfor Danny Brook who was not in the pieceplay. And last, at the end of the programperformance, we would likehave liked to have a drink in the theatre Restaurant, but it was already closed due to the poor attendance.

I'm looking forward to hearing from you.
